sen.j: 吉姫神社（よしひめじんじゃ）は、滋賀県湖南市にある神社。
sen.e: Yoshihime-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine that exists in Konan City, Shiga Prefecture
Yoshihime-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Konan City, Shiga Prefecture
sen.cmt: that existsをlocatedに変更しました。
sen.e: Yoshihime-jinja Shrine is a Shinto shrine located in Konan City, Shiga Prefecture

sen.j: コノハナノサクヤビメを祀り、上鹿葺津姫、吉比女大神を配祀する。
sen.e: The shrine enshrines Konohana sakuya bime, 上鹿葺津姫 and Yoshihime Okami.
sen.cmt: 「上鹿葺津姫」の読みは不明です。
sen.e: The shrine enshrines Konohanano sakuya bime, Uwakashitsuhime and Yoshihime Okami.
sen.cmt: 「上鹿葺津姫」：おそらく「うわかしつひめ」と思われます。スペルミスを修正しました。
sen.e: The shrine enshrines Konohanano sakuya bime, Uwakashitsuhime and Yoshihime Okami.

sen.j: 吉御子神社とは対の関係にあり、5月1日の例祭では両社から神輿が出る。
sen.e: The shrine is the counterpart of Yoshimiko-jinja Shrine, and at the reisai (regular festival) on May 1 portable shrine are carried around from both shrines.
The shrine is the counterpart of Yoshimiko-jinja Shrine, and at the reisai (regular festival) on May 1, portable shrines are carried around from both shrines.
sen.cmt: 複数形に修正しました。
sen.e: The shrine is the counterpart of Yoshimiko-jinja Shrine, and at the reisai (regular festival) on May 1, portable shrines are carried around from both shrines.

sen.j: 境内には万病に効果があるとされる宮前の湧水がある。
sen.e: In the precincts of the shrine there is a spring whose water is said to cure all ills.
In the precincts of the shrine there is a spring whose water is said to cure all ills.
In the precincts of the shrine there is a spring whose water is said to cure all ills.

sen.j: また、木造の狛犬は南北朝時代 (日本)に作られたと言われている。
sen.e: In addition, it is said that the wooden komainu (shrine guardian dog statues) were made during the period of Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).
In addition, it is said that the wooden komainu (shrine guardian dog statues) were made during the period of Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).
In addition, it is said that the wooden komainu (shrine guardian dog statues) were made during the period of Northern and Southern Courts (Japan).

tit.j: 所在地・交通アクセス

sen.e: 1-4-8, Ishibehigashi, Konan City, Shiga Prefecture
1-4-8, Ishibehigashi, Konan City, Shiga Prefecture
1-4-8, Ishibehigashi, Konan City, Shiga Prefecture

sen.j: JR草津線 石部駅 から市内循環バス（めぐるくん）で約5分「古宮」下車、徒歩約5分。
sen.e: Get off at Ishibe Station of JR Kusatsu Line, then get on the City Loop Bus (Meguru-kun), get off at 'Furumiya,' and from there about five minutes on foot.
Get off at Ishibe Station of JR Kusatsu Line, then get on the City Loop Bus (Meguru-kun) and off at 'Furumiya,' and walk from there about five minutes.
Get off at Ishibe Station of JR Kusatsu Line, then get on the City Loop Bus (Meguru-kun) and off at 'Furumiya,' and walk from there about five minutes.

sen.j: 名神高速道路栗東インターチェンジから国道1号などを経由。
sen.e: From Ritto Interchange of Meishin Expressway to National Route 1 and other routes
From Ritto Interchange of Meishin Expressway, take National Route 1 and other routes.
From Ritto Interchange of Meishin Expressway, take National Route 1 and other routes.
There is parking space for two cars in the shrine.
Two parking lots are available.
Two parking lots are available.
